verses.verse: <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> the <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3870>beg<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> to <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G516>worthily<s%> of the <S%G2821>calling<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> you were <S%G2564>called,<s%>

<S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5012>lowliness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4236>humility,<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3115>patience,<s%> <S%G430>bearing<s%> with one <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G26>love;<s%>
being <S%G4704>eager<s%> to <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G1775>unity<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4886>bond<s%> of <S%G1515>peace.<s%>

There is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> you also were <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2821>calling;<s%>
<S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G908>baptism,<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> to <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G2257>us<s%> was the <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G3358>measure<s%> of the <S%G1431>gift<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> he <S%G3004>says,<s%> "When he <S%G305>ascended<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G5311>high,<s%> he <S%G162>led<s%> <S%G161>captivity<s%> <S%G162>captive,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1390>gifts<s%> to <S%G444>men.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3588>this,<s%> "He <S%G305>ascended,<s%>" <S%G5101>what<s%> is <S%G2076>it<s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361>but<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2597>he<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2737>lower<s%> <S%G3313>parts<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth?<s%>

He <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G846>one<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G305>ascended<s%> far <S%G5231>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G4137>fill<s%> all <S%G3956>things.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>He<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G3303>some<s%> to be <S%G652>apostles;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3588>some,<s%> <S%G4396>prophets;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3588>some,<s%> <S%G2099>evangelists;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3588>some,<s%> <S%G4166>shepherds<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1320>teachers;<s%>

<S%G4314>for<s%> the <S%G2677>perfecting<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G1248>serving,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3619>building<s%> up of the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

<S%G3360>until<s%> <S%G2658>we<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2658>attain<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1775>unity<s%> of the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> a full <S%G5046>grown<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3358>measure<s%> of the <S%G2244>stature<s%> of the <S%G4138>fullness<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

<S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5600>we<s%> may no <S%G3371>longer<s%> <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G3516>children,<s%> tossed back and <S%G2831>forth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> carried <S%G4064>about<s%> with <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G417>wind<s%> of <S%G1319>doctrine,<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G2940>trickery<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3834>craftiness,<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4314>after<s%> the <S%G3180>wiles<s%> of <S%G4106>error;<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> speaking <S%G226>truth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> we may grow <S%G837>up<s%> in all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G2776>head,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

<S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%> being fitted <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4822>knit<s%> <S%G4883>together<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> that <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G860>joint<s%> <S%G2024>supplies,<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1753>working<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3358>measure<s%> of <S%G1520>each<s%> <S%G1538>individual<s%> <S%G3313>part,<s%> <S%G4160>makes<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G838>increase<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3619>building<s%> up of <S%G1438>itself<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G26>love.<s%>

<S%G5124>This<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3143>testify<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G2532>longer<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> also <S%G4043>walk,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3153>futility<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3563>mind,<s%>

<S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G4654>darkened<s%> in their <S%G1271>understanding,<s%> <S%G526>alienated<s%> from the <S%G2222>life<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G52>ignorance<s%> that <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G4457>hardening<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts;<s%>

<S%G3748>who<s%> having become <S%G524>callous<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G3860>up<s%> to <S%G766>lust,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2039>work<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4124>greediness.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3129>did<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> that <S%G3779>way;<s%>

if <S%G1489>indeed<s%> you <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%>

that <S%G5209>you<s%> put <S%G659>away,<s%> as <S%G2596>concerning<s%> your <S%G4387>former<s%> way of <S%G391>life,<s%> the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> grows <S%G5351>corrupt<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of <S%G539>deceit;<s%>
<S%G1161>and<s%> that you be <S%G365>renewed<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3563>mind,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> put <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> in the <S%G2596>likeness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> has been <S%G2936>created<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3742>holiness<s%> of <S%G225>truth.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore,<s%> putting <S%G659>away<s%> <S%G5579>falsehood,<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> each <S%G1538>one<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4139>neighbor.<s%> <S%G3754>For<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> of one <S%G240>another.<s%>

"Be <S%G3710>angry,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G264>sin.<s%>" <S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G1931>let<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> go <S%G1931>down<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3950>wrath,<s%>
<S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> to the <S%G1228>devil.<s%>

Let <S%G2813>him<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2813>stole<s%> <S%G2813>steal<s%> no <S%G3371>more;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> let <S%G2872>him<s%> <S%G2872>labor,<s%> <S%G2038>working<s%> <S%G5495>with<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> the thing that <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G18>good,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G2192>have<s%> something to <S%G3330>give<s%> to him <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5532>need.<s%>

<S%G1607>Let<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4550>corrupt<s%> <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1487>such<s%> as <S%G5100>is<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G3619>building<s%> up as the <S%G5532>need<s%> may <S%G2443>be,<s%> that it may <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> to those who <S%G191>hear.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G3076>grieve<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G1722>God,<s%> in <S%G3739>whom<s%> you were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G629>redemption.<s%>

<S%G142>Let<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4088>bitterness,<s%> <S%G2372>wrath,<s%> <S%G3709>anger,<s%> <S%G2906>outcry,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G988>slander,<s%> be put <S%G142>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2549>malice.<s%>

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G5543>kind<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2155>tenderhearted,<s%> <S%G5483>forgiving<s%> each <S%G1438>other,<s%> <S%G2532>just<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> also <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G5483>forgave<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%>
